title: Failure in update
body: every time i try to update , it's gonna failed , what's the reason ?

replies.body: I couldn't really say for sure without more information.  Usually, a failed update will provide an error message that gives more information on what happened.  Let me know what that says.

it say " unspecified error occurred. please check the log for more information"

i want to let you know that the game didn't open before that . every time i tried to open the game the logo appear then disappear after some minutes . but now after opening , i try to update it  , that message appears to me and every time i click retry . i'm afraid to close the game because the game maybe wont be opened again

Thanks for the info!  It sounds like your PC is blocking the patcher from loading or reading your game files and resulting in these issues.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up, making sure to go over each step.  Let me know if you have any questions!
but before latest update , i could open the game and there wasn't any problem
